title: Coastal California Retreat on Huntington Beach with Award-Winning Spa & Four Dining Options
description: Become enamoured by Southern California at Paséa Hotel & Spa, a beachfront gem in the heart of Huntington Beach. Relish in the vibrant local dining scene or savour the culinary delights at the hotel's oceanfront dining venues. Unwind at the Balinese-inspired Aarna Spa or surf iconic waves and, as the sun sets, retreat to your chic, ocean-view room or sip a cocktail on the rooftop bar, soaking in the breathtaking Pacific Ocean panoramas.
offer_address: 21080 Pacific Coast Highway, Huntington Beach 92648, California, United States
